Package jparsec.astrophysics.gildas

Classes to manipulate Gildas files.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Convertible
    Interface to convert data from the format stored in .30m files.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ByteArrayConverter
    The ByteArrayConverter class provides methods for writing, and reading different primitive types to, and from an array of bytes.
    ConverterFactory
    Provides the appropriate interface to convert the data of .30m files.
    EEEI2EEEI
    Implementation of the EEEI format for GILDAS files.
    Gildas30m
    A class to read spectra (.30m files) in the GILDAS format.
    IEEE2EEEI
    Implementation of the IEEE format for GILDAS files.
    LMVCube
    A class to read/write lmv (GILDAS) datacubes.
    Parameter
    A simple class to hold parameters that contains a value, a description, and a data type.
    ProcessSpectrum
    Spectrum reduction.
    pyGildas
    This class allows GILDAS (or any other program) to be run and commanded in background.
    Spectrum30m
    A class to hold the properties of an spectrum, including all the information from the header.
    SpectrumHeader30m
    A class to hold the header of a spectrum (.30m files).
    SpectrumLine
    A class to hold data for a fitted line.
    VAX2EEEI
    Implementation of the VAX format for GILDAS files.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LMVCube.PROJECTION
    The set of cube projections.
    Parameter.DATA_TYPE
    The set of data types for the parameters.
    Spectrum30m.XUNIT
    The set of units for x axis.
    SpectrumHeader30m.HEADER
    The set of header parameters.
    SpectrumHeader30m.VISIBLE_HEADER
    The set of 'visible' header parameters, those that appear when showing a spectrum in Gildas in long format.

Package jparsec.astrophysics.gildas Description

Classes to manipulate Gildas files.

This package contains classes to operate with data in GILDAS format.
